rules.text: DO interact with others as if you're at a friend's party: be polite, inquisitive, supportive, observant and all the other nice things that make parties great. And above all: have fun!
DO NOT ruin your friend's party by being nasty, obnoxious, hateful and all the other things that will get you ejected from a party.

records.text: Discovered this lovely show/mini-series on #Apple+. El Deafo is adapted from a graphic novel by Cece Bell of the same name. It is a loosely biographic story depicting her childhood, when she lost her hearing at a young age and required the assistance of a hearing aid. I loved the sound design and it opened my eyes as to how to world can look and sound in ways I had not thought of before. Love Apple+ content! So much of what they put out is pure quality! #eldeafo #cecebell #hearingloss
